vibesExplanation:
The workout is classified with strong confidence into 'The Meditative Grind' because it focuses on rowing, a repetitive and endurance-based activity. The term "go the distance" suggests a steady, enduring effort typical of a meditative workout. The low-to-moderate intensity level (1 out of 3) also supports a less strenuous, more methodical vibe, characteristic of meditative workouts. The playlist features indie and alternative music, which can create a calming yet engaging atmosphere.

The 'Endorphin Wave' is also applicable, as the gradual buildup and rhythmic climb can lead to a feel-good, elevated energy state. The description indicates a rhythm climb, aligning with the steady build aspect of this vibe. The diversity of the playlist, featuring popular bands like Weezer and Everclear, can contribute to maintaining a motivational atmosphere. However, the emphasis on rhythm and duration leans more towards the meditative aspect. Other vibes were excluded due to the lack of high-intensity cues and explicit competitive or extreme elements.
